channel.title: CVE Feed for birb-digital -- all

item.title: CVE-2021-29467|2024-08-03T22:11:05.420Z -- birb-digital -- wrongthink
item.description: Wrongthink is an encrypted peer-to-peer chat program. A user could check their fingerprint into the service and enter a script to run arbitrary JavaScript on the site. No workarounds exist, but a patch exists in version 2.4.1.
